issue.title: [C++][Compute] Wrap grouped aggregation in an ExecNode
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12759](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12759). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11928 adds ExecNodes, to which GroupByNode should be added so that a dataset scan can terminate in a grouped aggregation

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12759?focusedCommentId=17386222) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10660
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10660>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12759?focusedCommentId=17386316) by Ian Cook (icook):*
Should this have Fix Version: 6.0.0?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12759?focusedCommentId=17386328) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Yes (cc `[~kszucs]`, there's probably a few others to fix)
